title: karuNa nidhi vani
sahitya:
karuNAnidhivani neranammina nannu karuNincavadEmi

anupallavi

 sharaNAgata pOSaNa birutAnga paramAnanda paripUrNa ninnu

caraNam 1

 parama puruSa nI smaraNamu sEyucu darita dUrulai merayucu niNDE 
parama bhAgavatula pAda sEvakuDAnai nirupamAna maunI caritamulani vini
 
caraNam 2

 shuravaruDani ninnE sharaNu caraNanina karivaru moravini parama dayAluvai 
siri modalagu nI parijanula maraci veravaku manucunu duramuna bOcina
 
caraNam 3

 rAmacandrapura vara budha pAlana rAmadAsa hrttApa shamanA 
kAma pUrituDaina nannu nISkAmunigA jEsi pAlinceTi
